Exactly who is the Central Park “Refugee Like Tents Hospital” Designed For?
As a bottom up NYC medical doctor, I can see how makeshift tents set up in Central Park could be used as a walk-thru COVID-19 symptoms triage units or as morgues; but NOT a tent to place COVID-19 patients in the wealthiest city/nation in the world. The governor said that he identified schools, hotels, dorms and other enclosed buildings to set up make-shift hospitals. What happened to that proposal? There are thousands of other more suitable properties available in New York City and many of them are owned by ‘non-for profit’ mega medical centers. The Central park tents hospital is nothing more than an evangelical missionary vision that should not be realized in the wealthiest city/nation of the planet.

Say no to hospitalize sick New Yorkers in the park! Think about this: would Cuomo and DeBlasio send any of their family who could be diagnosed with the virus to the Central Park “Refugee Like” tents?
Americans should be shame to tell the world that we are planning to hospitalize our sick in the park while we have all these enclosed resources.

snippet.textDisplay: Greetings from Viet Nam, where I've been teaching English for some time. Thanks for this interview with the leading light on the subject. As for Viet Nam, the moment word came out of China that there was a deadly virus, the government here immediately put brakes on exchange with China.  They started testing people coming in on flights. Every day they kept expanding their checks. Likely many infected people got through the screening, but schools, shut down for the Tet Lunar New Year, stayed closed after because parents were concerned about their children's safety--and the fact that "other children" would likely sneeze and cough on their kids! We had a "perfect" Trump number, 16, for a couple of weeks, but that total has soared in the past couple of weeks. Fortunately, there's been no panic buying. Stores have toilet paper! Anyway, tomorrow, on April 1, we go on nationwide stay-in-place because our numbers have gotten dangerously high, too high for this government: 207, according to the Johns Hopkins University coronavirus map. (Yes, two-hundred-seven is considered a "lock down" reason.) This is the difference, I think, between a truly secular government with a modest leadership listening to medical science and a faith-based government like that of Iran or the US with self-proclaimed gods who listen to themselves.

snippet.textDisplay:
(Sources: PubMed, CDC)
Headlines everywhere report: Covid19 recovery rates: 80%. Fatality rates: 20%. When we take into account the false-positive stats reported by PubMed, it’s hard not to raise an eyebrow.

PubMed Report:
”When the infection rate of the close contacts and the sensitivity and specificity of reported results were taken as the point estimates, the positive predictive value of the active screening was only 19.67%, in contrast, the false-positive rate of positive results was 80.33%. “

80 Percent! Which means, a number of people could have an alternative virus related fatality and be falsely reported as a Covid19 victim.

In conclusion, here’s what the CDC says about the test for the Coronavirus. It is a CDC paragraph about results.

“Positive [test] results are indicative of active infection with 2019-nCoV but do not rule out bacterial infection or co-infection with other viruses. The agent detected may not be the definite cause of disease.”

That is exactly how you would describe an inaccurate test that causes false positives.

https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32133832/?fbclid=IwAR3LHLplRtmPZED3jt_Hjf2ZKysmDcXMU5LgVgNPcqNAtb9EzcQBKMtCIoI

snippet.textDisplay:
Why is 'free thought' ridiculed, challenged, and threatened when a person is opposed to the 'mainstream-narrative'?
[2] remains fixed (degree allowable by 'economic recession/expansion')
[1] remains a variable
[1] dependent on a 'controlled' system of information dissemination 
What happens when 90% of the media is controlled/owned by (6) corporations?
What happens when those same corporations are operated and controlled by a political ideology? 
What happens when the news is no longer free from bias? 
What happens when the news is no longer reliable and independent? 
What happens when the news is no longer trustworthy?
What happens when the news simply becomes an extension/arm of a political party?
Fact becomes fiction?
Fiction becomes fact?
When does news become propaganda?
Identity creation?
How does the average person, who is under constant financial stress (by design), find time to research and discern fact v fiction? 
Majority of people more prone to believe someone in power sitting behind a big brand ‘news’ name?
Do people [human psyche] tend to follow the ‘majority/mainstream viewpoint’ in fear of being isolated and/or shunned?
‘Mainstream’ is used for a reason [dominate trend in opinion].
[If majority of people believe ‘x’ then ‘x’ must be validated / true]
Why do ‘mainstream’ media heads, within different orgs, always use the same keywords and/or catch phrases? 
Coordinated? By who? Outside entity providing instructions?
Do they count on the fact that people [human psyche] are more prone to believe something if heard over-and-over again by different ‘trusted’ sources? 
Do ‘echo chamber’ tactics provide validation / credibility to the topic/point being discussed? 
Threat to intellectual freedom? 
Would control over[of] these institutions/organizations allow for the mass control of a populations viewpoint re: a desired topic? 
Read again – digest. 
Would control over[of] these institutions/organizations allow for the mass control of a populations viewpoint re: a desired topic? 
Logical thinking. 
Why, after the election of 2016, did [D]’s and media corps jumpstart a [coordinated & planned] divisive blitz intended to create falsehoods re: illegitimacy of election, character assassination of POTUS through sexism, racism, every other ‘ism’? 
Pre/post 2016 election?
Why were violent [masked] terror orgs such as Antifa immediately created/funded?
Why were these orgs tasked w/ immediate intimidation/shut down of any pro-POTUS rally and/or events? 
Why were marches immediately organized to counter and silence pro-POTUS rally and/or events?
Why were marches immediately organized which divided people into sex/gender, race, [ism]?
When you control the levers of news dissemination, you control the narrative.
Control of the narrative = power
When you are blind, what do you see?
They want you divided.
Divided by religion.
Divided by sex.
Divided by political affiliation. 
Divided by class.
When you are divided, and angry, and controlled, you target those ‘different’ from you, not those responsible [controllers].
Divided you are weak.
Divided you pose no threat to their control. 
When ‘non-dogmatic’ information becomes FREE & TRANSPARENT it becomes a threat to those who attempt to control the narrative and/or stable [livestock kept – sheep].
When you are awake, you stand on the outside of the stable (‘group-think’ collective), and have ‘free thought’. 
"Free thought" is a philosophical viewpoint which holds that positions regarding truth should be formed on the basis of logic, reason, and empiricism, rather than authority, tradition, revelation, or dogma. 
THIS REPRESENTS A CLEAR AND PRESENT DANGER TO THE CONSTITUTIONAL REPUBLIC OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA.
Q
